---
title: "10 — Future: High-NA EUV, Sustainability, and Impact"
---

High-NA EUV (NA ~0.55) improves resolution (~8 nm half-pitch) and may reduce multi-patterning. It introduces anamorphic imaging and tighter tolerances.

:::{.callout-note}
### Sustainability Levers
- More efficient light sources  
- Improved mirror reflectivity  
- Thermal management and waste heat recovery  
- Lifecycle analysis to reduce environmental footprint
:::

:::{.callout-tip}
### Takeaway
High-NA EUV extends Moore’s Law as the industry pushes for greener, more efficient manufacturing.
:::

### Throughput and Economics
Next-gen tools target >185 wafers/hour. Higher throughput offsets dose needs and process overheads; better source power and collector efficiency are central to this.

#### Interactive: Chips per Day (Illustrative)
Assumptions: 300 mm wafers, perfect packing estimate using wafer area ≈ 70,685 mm², simple loss factor 0.82 for edge and scribe.

```{vega-lite}
{
  "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v5.json",
  "data": {"url": "../data/throughput_grid.csv"},
  "transform": [
    {"calculate": "datum.utilization_percent/100", "as": "util"},
    {"calculate": "70685 * 0.82 / datum.die_area_mm2", "as": "dies_per_wafer"},
    {"calculate": "datum.wafers_per_hour * 24 * datum.util/1000", "as": "k_wafers_per_day"},
    {"calculate": "datum.wafers_per_hour * 24 * datum.util * (70685 * 0.82 / datum.die_area_mm2)", "as": "chips_per_day"}
  ],
  "mark": {"type": "point", "filled": true, "size": 120},
  "encoding": {
    "x": {"field": "die_area_mm2", "type": "quantitative", "title": "Die area (mm²)"},
    "y": {"field": "chips_per_day", "type": "quantitative", "title": "Chips per day (illustrative)"},
    "color": {"field": "wafers_per_hour", "type": "nominal", "title": "Wafers/hour"},
    "shape": {"field": "utilization_percent", "type": "nominal", "title": "Utilization %"},
    "tooltip": [
      {"field": "wafers_per_hour"},
      {"field": "die_area_mm2"},
      {"field": "utilization_percent"},
      {"field": "chips_per_day", "type": "quantitative", "format": ".2f"}
    ]
  }
}
```

### Industry Ecosystem
System integrators, optics leaders, laser-source specialists, and materials suppliers co-develop key subsystems (optics, sources, masks, resists, metrology).
